benchmark_details.name: Koglish (Korean-English Code-Switching Dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: The Koglish dataset is tailored for English-Korean code-switching scenarios, introducing Koglish-GLUE, Koglish-NLI, and Koglish-STS datasets to facilitate the study and evaluation of code-switching in natural language processing.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a resource for studying and evaluating code-switching scenarios in English-Korean interaction and to enhance the effectiveness of multilingual models in such contexts.

data.source: Constructed using various language datasets with a focus on code-switching scenarios, using constituency parsing for dataset generation.
data.size: Varies by sub-dataset; details available in the paper.
data.annotation: Manual evaluation by bilingual experts in Korean and English.

methods: Experimental evaluation using various multilingual models
methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on model performance outputs on the Koglish datasets.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in understanding and processing code-switched sentences.
methodology.validation: Performed with cross-validation using bilingual experts' evaluations.
